channel.title: [HELP] Problem with Barrows [HELP]

item.title: [HELP] Problem with Barrows [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I was making barrows then decided to test it out, the thing is, when i get to Killcount 5 I try to open the tomb thing, and it’s supposed to take you to the tunnels where you fight the last monster, however, it takes you to the start of barrows… I will give you the code and possibly you could tell me whats gone wrong?

[code] case 6727:
if (Barrows == 4 && BarrowskillCount >= 6 && absX == 3551 && absY == 9683) {
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID + 2, 0);
ReplaceObject(3552, 9684, 6746, -2);
}
if (Barrows == 4 && BarrowskillCount >= 6 && absX == 3552 && absY == 9688) {
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID + 2, -2);
ReplaceObject(3551, 9688, 6746, 0);
}
if (Barrows == 4 && BarrowskillCount <= 5) {
Send(“You need to defeat the last brother in the tunnels before you can open that!”);
}
break;

		case 6746:
			if (Barrows == 4 && BarrowskillCount >= 6 && absX == 3552 && absY == 9683) {
				ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID + 2, -2);
				ReplaceObject(3551, 9684, 6727, 0);
			}
			if (Barrows == 4 && BarrowskillCount >= 6 && absX == 3551 && absY == 9688) {
				ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID + 2, 0);
				ReplaceObject(3552, 9688, 6727, -2);
			}
			if (Barrows == 4 && BarrowskillCount <= 5) {
				Send("You need to defeat the last brother in the tunnels before you can open that!");
			}
			break;[/code]

Thanks for any help you can give.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2009, 12:11:11 pm[/size][hr]Please someone must know what I’ve done wrong…
